column4: Hello all. After upgrading to 11.04 beta, my X session keeps freezing. The mouse cursor can still move periodically, but all of the windows will not work. This happens after I login and begin using the session. Video card = nVidia Corporation G96 [GeForce 9500 GT]
I've read that using the nouveau driver fixes this, but how do I enable it?
you'd have to remove the nvidia binary driver if you want to try the nouveau driver
Makes sense. Just joined ubuntu recently. Is that as simple as uninstalling the nvidia driver and installing the nouveau driver?
